title: 142: Aerodactyl
description:
A rock that flies.

Hosts: [Chris](https://twitter.com/DaLiquidSword), [Mark](https://www.twitch.tv/robobobatron), [Chris](https://twitter.com/DaLiquidSword), [Mark](https://www.twitch.tv/robobobatron), [Aleksandar](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC56emXYp1pHXL2E9SLcYisw), [Ethan](https://twitter.com/SynSpawn), Joe, Blake
